speaker: Oath on the Sand
lines: The bell rings off and the crowd settles.
You kneel and press your hand into the sand.
You swear to fight with purpose and keep your word.
A runner brings a bundle wrapped in old banners.
Inside is a weapon earned in the ring.
The medic smiles and returns to work.

give_item.name: Arena Edge
give_item.description: A blade tempered by cheers and stubbornness
